casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kevin CROW. No. 45P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 10, 2006. Patricia Duffy, Assistant Attorney General, Seth Edwards, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of February 2006 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of February 2006."
